infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: AccuHeal uses health data to provide personalized acupressure recommendations.

meta.title: AccuHeal - Professional Acupressure Guide
meta.description: Discover natural healing with AccuHeal's comprehensive guide to 89 acupressure points. Learn Traditional Chinese Medicine techniques for pain relief, stress management, and better sleep.
meta.keywords: acupressure, TCM, traditional Chinese medicine, natural healing, pain relief, stress relief, wellness, health app
meta.author: AccuHeal
